sentence: Staff was over the top nice everyone had smiles on their faces everyone knew your name even the cleaning staff turned off vacuums down the hall so you did not have to listen to them as you walked to your room
The rooms were spacious a beautiful bathroom with full size toiletries I was delighted as my pet hate is having to ask for replacements when you are staying in the hotel for several nights
All the furnishings were of the highest quality and the complimentary bath toiletries went down very well with the wife
Warm welcome from the stafVery trendy and lovely décor in the lobby restaurant and bar
I appreciated the free coffee bar set up in the mornings by the elevators
Upon check in the valet service was friendly and helpful we were greeted with complimentary sparkling wine in the lobby and were lucky enough to score an ocean view room
This hotel features very luxurious accommodations for a pretty decent price
I was offered two free beverages with VIP amenities and they gave us a tiny bottle of water each upon check in which I ’m sure every guest receives
Hotel facilities were nice everything look clean and modern
Lobby bar is cool and fun
This meant the big lobby and whole pool area were closed down
I feel expedia Viceroy should have disclosed before I booked that the hotel lobby pool restaurant etc were under complete renovation would be inaccessible
I understood that they need to rework the new lobby and garden terrace

As for the pool TINY looks so much bigger in the pictures I would not want to be there in the summer I can image it would be like a can or sardinesService was generally great restaurant and bar staff went above and beyond reception and concierge not so much
Some of the occupants were loud in the hallway so early in the morning too
Actually the hotel should have been closed during works as charging 50 usd per nights with zero facilities is outrageous
I was notified there is no amenities available at the moment upon arrival which I understood and am fine with
Given the rates charged I assumed there would still be some amenities like at least a bar but there is nothing
Not only is the hotel under complete renovation and is a construction site offers nothing but an elevator to the room
That we missed the upgraded facilities but next time
